newsitem.title: JAPAN: Hitachi says won't buy Hosiden LCDs for now.
newsitem.headline: Hitachi says won't buy Hosiden LCDs for now.

text.p: Hitachi Ltd said on Wednesday that it would not buy liquid crystal displays (LCDs) from Hosiden Corp for the time being.

A Hitachi spokesman said the firm negotiated a possible purchase of LCDs for notebook-type personal computers from Hosiden but had decided not to buy them immediately as they did not meet requirements.
The decision will not affect Hitachi's PC production, he said.
He added that the two firms would continue discussions and that Hitachi might buy LCDs from Hosiden in the future.
